metadata.title: CVE-2023-20938 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In binder_transaction_buffer_release of binder.c, there is a possible useafter free due to improper input validation. This could lead to localescalation of privilege with no additional execution privileges needed.User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product: AndroidVersions:Android kernelAndroid ID: A-257685302References: Upstream kernel

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-20938` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-144-generic - 5.4.0-144.161~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-144-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-144.161~18.04.1
linux-image-5.4.0-144-lowlatency - 5.4.0-144.161~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-144-generic - 5.4.0-144.161~18.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-144-lowlatency - 5.4.0-144.161~18.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1097-aws - 5.4.0-1097.105~18.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1104-azure - 5.4.0-1104.110~18.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1101-gcp - 5.4.0-1101.110~18.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1045-ibm - 5.4.0-1045.50~18.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-1094-oracle - 5.4.0-1094.103~18.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-5.4.0-1081-raspi - 5.4.0-1081.92~18.04.1
No subscription required
